attributes.action: Change all public transport including buses and trains to electric now, in order to make our country more environmentally friendly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By making this change sooner rather than later the world will be a cleaner and safer place to live. It will save the government money on petrol prices leaving money for better health care for example. Lets step up and be the cleanest country in the world!
